text.p: True or False: If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is a [mathjaxinline]6\times 6[/mathjaxinline] matrix, and none of its columns are a scalar multiple of another, then [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] must be invertible.

True or False: If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are [mathjaxinline]6\times 6[/mathjaxinline] matrices, and [mathjaxinline]AB = I_6[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]BA = I_6[/mathjaxinline].
